description: Part-demolition, alterations and refurbishment of the former Royal London Hospital building including: retention and repair of the front and rear facades (including 1895 Portico and front Chapel extension); Removal of existing redundant pipework and wiring from facades; Demolition of existing south-west wing; Demolition of Grocer's Wing (behind retained faâ€¡ade at first, second and third floor level) and facsimile reconstruction of mansard roof, dormer windows and chimneys; repair and replacement of all existing windows; Internal reconfiguration and refurbishment works including opening up and removal of internal walls and partitions; and the installation of connecting 'bridge' links to a part four-storey and part seven-storey extension (including partial basement) at the rear of the building. All in connection with the proposed redevelopment and change of use of the building to provide new Tower Hamlets Civic CentreSection 19 Minor Material Amendment to Listed Building Consent Ref: PA/17/02828, Dated 08/05/2018Amendment include: Variation of Condition 2 (drawings) and rewording of Condition 9 (hidden historic features)
site_name: The Former Royal London Hospital, Whitechapel Road, London
